title: 可以點樣入去克里米亞

replies.msg:
(利申: 而家冇任何計劃去, 純粹好奇)

https://en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Crimea#Get_in
After the annexation of Crimea by Russia, Russian immigration and custom agencies started operating in the peninsula's ports of entry, and foreign citizens now need regular Russian entry visas to visit Crimea.
Since December 2014, it has not been possible to travel from Ukraine to the Crimean peninsula by public transport. Unless you hold a Ukrainian passport, you will need a special permission from the Ukrainian government in order to cross the "Ukraine-Crimea" border by foot.
Officials of the Ukrainian border authorities announced in 2014 that an entry to Crimea not from the mainland Ukraine will be considered as an "illegal entry to the territory of Ukraine". In practice, it means that if, after entering Crimea from mainland Russia, a foreign citizen tries to enter the mainland Ukraine, he/she will be subject to a administrative or criminal prosecution (a fine, a possible denial of entry to Ukraine or an imprisonment).

係咪即係話, 作為一個外國人想入去克里米亞, 但又唔想永遠入唔到烏克蘭 (而唔畀人拉), 係咪只有用兩本護照呢招?

俄羅斯陸路或飛機去

SIP 大把機由莫斯科去！

俄羅斯陸路或飛機去

SIP 大把機由莫斯科去！


但上面條link話你經俄羅斯入境, 以後去烏克蘭就麻撚煩

俄羅斯其他城市飛過去根本唔洗做出入境手續，冇 record.

但我唔肯定有冇國際線航班，國際線出入境有 SIP 機場個印，會唔會去烏克蘭有問題，真係唔知！

烏東嘅盧干斯克同頓內次克兩個獨立國，聽講出入境唔會蓋印，蓋咗應該唔洗旨意入烏克蘭。

常理唔會有出入境印。

烏克蘭點會知你去過克里米亞？
如果咁計烏克蘭政府只係大鳩你, 嚇到人唔敢去Crimea, 宣示主權+打擊俄國旅遊業

但陸路就會蓋印?


陸路都唔會，但你唔會走陸路去，除非你去羅斯托夫果邊，果邊坐車去都十幾個鐘。

莫斯科直飛好過！

wiki travel 都係唔 update.

利申：月尾會出發去幾個前烏克蘭領土。

明啦 THX

https://www.tripadvisor.com/ShowTopic-g313972-i7465-k10297115-To_Crimea_from_Ukraine_still_impossible_until_now-Crimea.html

Oravad, if you declare officially you've been to Crimea - Uraine will ban you from visiting.

As this is not traceable on paper (as part of Russia there will be no stamps in passport/etc) - your chances of being banned to Ukraine are low if you refrain from public political statements, or if someone, say, points attention to your Facebook account with photos, etc...

Seems not to be obstacle for common people.
